Default DGM handler

Source: R/dgm.R
dgm.default.Rd

Default DGM handler

Usage

# Default S3 method
dgm(dgm_name, settings)

Arguments

dgm_name

Character string specifying the DGM type

settings

List containing the required parameters for the DGM or numeric condition_id
